task_summary: Pick the green bottle from the tabletop using a side pinch grasp and lift it off the surface.

task_long_description.overview: A UR-style manipulator faces a semicircular white table with several small containers aligned near the table edge. The green bottle sits slightly right of center, near a tall pink cylinder and a blue can. The robot must detect the green bottle, align, plan a side pinch grasp, close the gripper, verify the grasp, and lift the bottle vertically to clear the surface without disturbing neighbors.
preconditions: Robot reachable workspace covers the green bottle
Gripper functional and initially able to open
Table surface is static; objects are not occluded
stepwise_plan: Detect the green bottle on the table.
Open the gripper to the required width.
Approach and align with the bottle.
Compute a grasp pose using a side strategy and store it as goal_pose.
Execute the grasp motion to the goal_pose.
Close the gripper with moderate force.
Verify the object is in the gripper.
Raise the held bottle vertically to clear the table.
success_criteria: Bottle lifted at least 0.10 m from the surface
No significant disturbance to adjacent objects
failure_and_recovery: If detection fails, the sequence aborts; rerun detection.
If alignment times out, re-approach and realign.
If grasp fails or is unstable, reopen gripper, recompute grasp, and retry.
If collision risk detected, retreat and replan approach.
task_long_description.termination: Terminate once the bottle is securely held and raised above the table.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Detect the specified object and publish its pose.
Move near the object and align for grasping.
Compute grasp pose and store on blackboard.
Move to the computed grasp pose.
Close the gripper to secure the object.

recovery_strategy: Recompute grasp with alternate strategy (top or pinch)
Open gripper, retreat slightly, and retry
Increase force within safe limits if slip detected
assumptions: The green bottle is the right-of-center plastic bottle visible in frames 6–8.
Side pinch grasp is feasible given neighborhood spacing.
No placement is required; task stops after lifting.

expected_success_criteria: Bottle lifted ≥0.10 m and retained securely
